LuaFunction.Name: _SA_DRV_code()
LuaFunction.Description: Obtains the code for a point machine, derived from the switch it is related to with 'Driver sporveksel'.
LuaFunction.Formula: function _SA_DRV_code() local s,i,r,n,d,j s = "Driver sporveksel" r,n = RC__getCollectionOfRelatedObjects(s) if n == 0 then return "Relate with '"..s.."' to switch object (turnout).", _info("Point machines derive their code from the switch they are related to with '"..s.."'.") else pm,npm = RC__getCollectionOfRelatedObjects("Har sporvekseldrivmaskin",r[0]) j = 0 for i = 0, npm-1 do d = (r[0].dir == "up") and 1 or -1 if ((ReferenceMileage - pm[i].ReferenceMileage)*d >= 0) then j = j + 1 end end return string.format("%d.%d",r[0].code,j) end end

LuaFunction.Name: _SA_DRV_dir()
LuaFunction.Description: Obtains the direction (dir) for a point machine, derived from the switch it is related to with 'Driver sporveksel'.
LuaFunction.Formula: function _SA_DRV_dir() local s,sw,n s = "Driver sporveksel" sw,n = RC__getCollectionOfRelatedObjects(s) if n == 0 then return "unknown",_info("Point machines derive their direction from the switch they are related to with '"..s.."'.") else return sw[0].dir end end

LuaFunction.Name: _SA_DRV_Model3DName()
LuaFunction.Description: Obtains the 3D model name (Model3DName) for a point machine, derived from its Variant, direction (dir) and side of alignment (distanceToAlignment).
LuaFunction.Formula: function _SA_DRV_Model3DName() local t = "" if Variant == "Uspesifisert" then return "NO-BN-3D-FE-DIV-UKJENT" elseif Variant == "Alstom MET" then t = "NO-BN-3D-SA-DRV-SPORVEKSELDRIVMASKIN-ALSTOM-MET-" elseif Variant == "Siemens Bsg9" then t = "NO-BN-3D-SA-DRV-SPORVEKSELDRIVMASKIN-SIEMENS-BSG9-" elseif Variant == "Siemens ELS 710" then t = "NO-BN-3D-SA-DRV-SPORVEKSELDRIVMASKIN-SIEMENS-ELS710-" else return "NO-BN-3D-FE-DIV-UKJENT",_error,_info("Bad Variant ["..Variant.."].") end if ((dir == "up" and RightSided) or (dir == "down" and LeftSided)) then return t.."HSIDE" elseif ((dir == "up" and LeftSided) or (dir == "down" and RightSided)) then return t.."VSIDE" else return "Cannot determine side of track for point machine.",_error end end

CustomAttribute.Name: AngularOffset
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'AngularOffset' custom property [DD] is added to the object's basic 3D orientation. The basic orientation is defined by the current 'dir' property's up/down/none/both/unknown value. If property dir is 'unknown' then the orientation will be 45 degrees as a visual reminder that dir is unknown. For some objects types (e.g. yokes) the 2D symbol orientation will also be affected.

LuaFunction.Name: _SA_LOK_code()
LuaFunction.Description: Obtains the code for a local control panel, derived from the switch or derailer it is related to with 'Driver sporveksel' or 'Driver sporsperre'.
LuaFunction.Formula: function _SA_LOK_code() local s = "Omstiller sporveksel/sporsperre" local r,n = RC__getCollectionOfRelatedObjects(s) if n == 0 then return "UNFINISHED - Missing relation '"..s.."' to switch object or derailer object.",_warning, _info("A local control panel derives its code property from the switch or derailer which it is related to.") elseif n == 1 then if r[0].RcType == "KO-SPV Sporveksel" then local coupledSwitch,ncsw = RC__getCollectionOfRelatedObjects("Er koblet med sporveksel",r[0]) if ncsw == 0 then return r[0].code else return coupledSwitch[0].code.."/"..r[0].code end elseif r[0].RcType == "SA-SSP Sporsperre" then return r[0].code else return "ERROR - Bad RcType ["..r[0].RcType.."] for object related to Local control panel.",_error end else return "ERROR - More than 1 ["..n.."] object related to Local control panel.",_error end end

LuaFunction.Name: _SA_LOK_dir()
LuaFunction.Description: Obtains the dir (direction) for a local control panel, derived from the switch or derailer it is related to with 'Omstiller sporveksel/sporsperre'.
LuaFunction.Formula: function _SA_LOK_code() s = "Omstiller sporveksel/sporsperre" r,n = RC__getCollectionOfRelatedObjects(s) if n == 0 then return "unknown" else if r[0].RcType == "SA-LOK Lokalstiller" then return "both" else return r[0].dir end end end

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_DistanceToNextBalise
CustomAttribute.Description:
Below 2.35 meter: ERROR - Balise magnetic fields may merge - increase distance
 2.35-2.8 meter: WARNING - Outside recommended tolerance - increase distance
 2.8-3.2 meter: OK - The train will treat the balises as in the same group
 3.2-3.5 meter: WARNING - Outside recommended tolerance - decrease distance
 3.5-10.5 meter: ERROR - The train cannot determine balise group assignment
 10.5-11.8 meter: WARNING - Outside recommended tolerance - Increase distance
 Above 11.8 meter: OK - The train will treat the balises as belonging to different groups

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_DistanceToPreviousBalise
CustomAttribute.Description:
Below 2.35 meter: ERROR - Balise magnetic fields may merge - increase distance
 2.35-2.8 meter: WARNING - Outside recommended tolerance - increase distance
 2.8-3.2 meter: OK - The train will treat the balises as in the same group
 3.2-3.5 meter: WARNING - Outside recommended tolerance - decrease distance
 3.5-10.5 meter: ERROR - The train cannot determine balise group assignment
 10.5-11.8 meter: WARNING - Outside recommended tolerance - Increase distance
 Above 11.8 meter: OK - The train will treat the balises as belonging to different groups

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_DistanceToTrackVertically
CustomAttribute.Description: Below 2 meter: ERROR – Balise may be read by a train in the neighbouring track – increase distance\n 2-2.6 meter: WARNING – Allowed on condition that at least one of the group's A- and B-balise is above 2.6 meter from neighbouring track (large balise) resp. 2.3 meter (minibalise) – increase distance\n Over 2.6 meter: OK – Train in neighbouring track will pass without reading the balise

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_DistanceToTrackSideways
CustomAttribute.Description: Below 2 meter: ERROR – Balise may be read by a train in the neighbouring track – increase distance\n 2-2.6 meter: WARNING – Allowed on condition that at least one of the group's A- and B-balise is above 2.6 meter from neighbouring track (large balise) resp. 2.3 meter (minibalise) – increase distance\n Over 2.6 meter: OK – Train in neighbouring track will pass without reading the balise

SymbolDefinition.BlockNameFormat: NO-BN-2D-JBTSI-ATC-BALISE {% if Variant == 'Fylt/fast'or Variant == 'Fylt/styrt' %}FYLT {% else %}TOM {% endif %} {% if Variant == 'Fylt/styrt' or Variant == 'Tom/styrt' %}STYRT {% else %}FAST {% endif %} Metric

DefaultInterlockingExportOptions.ShuntingRoutesStartPointFilter: if (RcType == "SA-SIG Signal" and Dvergsignal == "Ja") then return NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber() end
DefaultInterlockingExportOptions.ShuntingRoutesEndPointFilter:
if (RcType == "SA-SIG Signal" and Dvergsignal == "Ja") then return NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber() elseif ((RcType == "SA-SIG Fiktivt punkt" and Variant == "Fiktivt sluttpunkt for togvei") or (RcType == "SA-SIG Togvei slutt")) then
return code end
DefaultInterlockingExportOptions.ViaPointFilter: if (RcType == "SA-SIG Fiktivt punkt" and Variant == "Viapunkt for betjeningsanlegg") then return "(v"..code..")" end
DefaultInterlockingExportOptions.ExtendedRoutePartFormatScript: base = StartName .. "-" .. EndName if ViaPoints.Count > 0 then via = ViaPoints[0].Value for i=1, ViaPoints.Count-1 do via = via .. "-" .. ViaPoints[i].Value end return base .. " via " .. via else return base end
DefaultInterlockingExportOptions.SwitchNameScript: dir = (position == "left") and "V" or "H" return switchObj.code .. dir

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the number extracted from the signal's Code, e.g. '4313UL' or 'UL4313' or '4313' => '4313'.
LuaFunction.Formula: function NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber(s) if s == nil then s = getObjectFromId(id) end -- Assume object really IS a signal... local c = tostring(s.Code) if c == nil then return "" end if c:match("%d+%D+") then -- digits + nondigits: return c:match("%d+%D+"):match("%d+") elseif c:match("%D+%d+") then -- nondigits + digits: return c:match("%D+%d+"):match("%d+") elseif c:match("%d+") then -- just digits: return c:match("%d+") else -- just nondigits, or empty: return "" end end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_getSignalLitra()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the litra extracted from the signal's Code, e.g. '4313UL' or 'UL4313' or 'UL' => 'UL'.
LuaFunction.Formula: function NOBN_sig_getSignalLitra(s) if s == nil then s = getObjectFromId(id) end -- Assume object really IS a signal... local c = tostring(s.Code) if c == nil then return "" end if c:match("%d+%D+") then -- digits + nondigits: return c:match("%d+%D+"):match("%D+") elseif c:match("%D+%d+") then -- nondigits + digits: return c:match("%D+%d+"):match("%D+") elseif c:match("%D+") then -- just nondigits: return c:match("%D+") else -- just digits, or empty: return "" end end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the formated short name extracted from a main/distant signal's Code, e.g. '4313UL' or 'UL4313' => '4313(UL)'.
LuaFunction.Formula: function NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName() if NOBN_sig_getSignalLitra() == "" then return NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber() else return NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber().."("..NOBN_sig_getSignalLitra()..")" end end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_getSignalFullName()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the elaborate name of the signal, formated according to Bane NOR standard practice.
LuaFunction.Formula:
function NOBN_sig_getSignalFullName() local t if RcType == "SA-SIG ERTMS" then if Variant == "ERTMS dverg" then return "EDs.R"..NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber() elseif Variant:match("E35") then t = "Mb." end
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Signal" then if (MainSignal == "Hs1") then t = "Stopplykt" elseif (MainSignal == "RepHs1" or MainSignal == "RepHs2") then t = "Rep.Hs." elseif (MainSignal ~= "-") then t = "Hs." elseif (DistantSignal ~= "-") then t = "Fs." elseif (EndOfTrainRouteSignal ~= "-") then t = "S66." elseif (DwarfSignal ~= "-") then return "Ds.R"..NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber() elseif (HighShuntingSignal ~= "-") then return "Z."..code else t = "Sig." --Covers all the remaining - MKs, FKs, Ls, LHs, AVs, BPs end
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Fiktivt punkt" then t = "Fik." if Variant == "Viapunkt for betjeningsanlegg" then return t..code elseif Variant == "Fiktivt sluttpunkt for togvei" then return t..NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName().." (HTv)" elseif Variant == "Fiktivt sluttpunkt for skiftevei" then return t..NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName().." (DTv)" elseif Variant == "Fiktivt sluttpunkt for togvei og skiftevei" then return t..NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName().." (HTv/DTv)" else return t..NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName().." (Bad variant ["..Variant.."])",_warning end
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Togsporsignal" then t = "Togsporsignal "..code
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Brusignal/Frostportsignal" then t = "Brusignal/Frostportsignal"..code
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Rasvarslingssignal" then t = "Rasvarslingssignal "..code
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Veisignal" then t = "Veisignal "..code
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Planovergangssignal" then t = (Variant:match("forsignal") and "PLO-Fs" or "PLO")..code else t = "Bad signal type ["..RcType.."] (code='"..code.."').",_warning end return t..NOBN_sig_getSignalShortName() end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_getSignalPartNames()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the signal component names, formated according to Bane NOR standard practice.
LuaFunction.Formula: function NOBN_sig_getSignalPartNames() local s = "" local errMsg = "*** Unrecognized signal configuration ***" if RcType == "SA-SIG ERTMS" then if Variant:match("E35") then s = "E35" end if Variant:lower():match("dverg") then s = s.."-EDS" end elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Signal" then if (MainSignal ~= "-") then s = s..MainSignal:upper() end if (DistantSignal ~= "-") then s = s.."-FS" end if (EndOfTrainRouteSignal ~= "-") then s = s.."-TVS" end if (DwarfSignal ~= "-") then s = s.."-DS" end if (HighShuntingSignal ~= "-") then s = s.."-ZS" end if (PositionLamp ~= "-") then s = s.."-MKS" end if (CautiousDrivingSignal ~= "-") then s = s.."-FKS" end if (LineSignal ~= "-") then s = s.."-LS" end if (OpticalSpeedSignal ~= "-") then s = s.."-LHS" end if (DepartureSignal ~= "-") then s = s.."-AVS" end if (BrakeTestSignal ~= "-") then s = s.."-BPS" end --TODO: More complete check of unrecognized combination elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Togsporsignal" then s = "Togsporsignal" elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Brusignal/Frostportsignal" then s = "Brusignal/Frostportsignal" elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Rasvarslingssignal" then s = "Rasvarslingssignal" elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Veisignal" then s = "Veisignal" elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Planovergangssignal" then s = "Planovergangssignal" elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Fiktivt punkt" then s = "Fiktivt punkt" else s = "Bad signal type ["..RcType.."].",_warning end if s:match("^-.+") then s = s:sub(2) end --Strip off leading dash character '-', if any return s end

CustomAttribute.Name: AngularOffset
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'AngularOffset' custom property [DD] is added to the object's basic 3D orientation. The basic orientation is defined by the current 'dir' property's up/down/none/both/unknown value. If property dir is 'unknown' then the orientation will be 45 degrees as a visual reminder that dir is unknown. For some objects types (e.g. yokes) the 2D symbol orientation will also be affected.

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_chkSafetyDistanceFromSignalToOcsMast()
LuaFunction.Description: Checks whether Returns the formated short name extracted from a main/distant signal's Code, e.g. '4313UL' or 'UL4313' => '4313(UL)'.
LuaFunction.Formula:
function NOBN_sig_chkSafetyDistanceFromSignalToOcsMast() local tolerance = 6 --Tolerance in meters
--Preamble - called from a relevant object type? if RcType ~= "SA-SIG ERTMS" and RcType ~= "SA-SIG Signal" and RcType ~= "SA-SIG Brusignal/Frostportsignal" and RcType ~= "SA-SIG Planovergang" and RcType ~= "SA-SIG Veisignal" then return "Bad signal type ["..RcType.."] (code='"..code.."'.",_warning end
--Check if this test can be omitted (a low signal): local omit = true if Yokemounted then omit = false
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG ERTMS" then return "OK - Low markerboard - Safety distance to OCS mast not relevant.",_ok
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Signal" then if HighShuntingSignal == "-" and MainSignal == "-" then return "OK - Free-standing low signal - Safety distance to OCS mast not relevant.",_ok end
elseif RcType == "SA-SIG Togsporsignal" then return "OK - Track signal (togsporsignal) - Safety distance to OCS mast not relevant.",_ok end
if not omit then local c1 = getNearbyPointObjects2D("EH-MAS KL-mast", tolerance) local c2 = getNearbyPointObjects2D("EH-MAS Hengemast for bru og tunnel", tolerance) local c3 = getNearbyPointObjects2D("EH-MAS Hengemast for åk", tolerance) local closeObjects = getUnionOfCollections( getCollectionFromTable({c1,c2,c3}) ) local count = getCollectionLength(closeObjects) local UpdateObjects = {} if count == 0 then return "OK - No catenary mast within tolerance "..tolerance.." meters.",_ok else local i = 0 local shortestDistance = math.huge local s = ": WARNING - Catenary mast" if (count > 1) then s = s.."s" end s = s.." [" while i ~= count do d = RC__getDistance2D(closeObjects[i]) if d < shortestDistance then shortestDistance = d end s = s..closeObjects[i].code table.insert(UpdateObjects, closeObjects[i]) i = i+1 if i ~= count then s = s..", " end end s = s.."]" return string.format("%.03f: %s located inside horizontal tolerance %.3f meters.",shortestDistance,s,tolerance),UpdateObjects,_warning end end end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_chkDistanceFromSignalToTrack()
LuaFunction.Description: Checks lateral distance from signal insertion point to closest track on left side (in the direction of increasing mileages). Call with argument 'Right' or 'Left'.
LuaFunction.Formula: function NOBN_sig_chkDistanceFromSignalToTrack(side) side = side and side:lower() or "(no arg)" if side ~= "left" and side ~= "right" then return "*** ERROR Function should be called with argument 'right' or 'left' ["..side.."]." end if Alignment == nil then return "UNFINISHED - Signal must first be assigned to an alignment to deduce its own direction." end if (DwarfSignal == "Ja" and MainSignal == "-" and Yokemounted) then return "WARNING - Shunting signal mounted in yoke. Please do manual check.",_warning end --2021-01-12 CLFEY: No warning just if high above but outside lateral problem distance. --if (RelativeElevation > 0.3) then return "WARNING - Signal mounted outside normal elevations. Please do manual check.",_warning end tracks = getClosestAlignments("KO-SPO Spor"):filter(function (x) return (side:upper() == "RIGHT" and 1 or -1) * getAlignmentInfo(x.id).DistanceToAlignment < 0 end) if getCollectionLength(tracks) == 0 then return "OK - No tracks to the "..side..".",_ok end ai = getAlignmentInfo(tracks[0].id) curveRadius = ai.CurveRadius Ki = 0.0 Ky = 0.0 tolerance = 2.12 --Many signals are covered with these formulas, but not all - use your insight wiesely: if (DwarfSignal ~= "-" and MainSignal == "-") then --Freestanding dwarf signal tolerance = tolerance + 0.25 elseif MainSignal ~= "-" or DistantSignal ~= "-" then tolerance = tolerance + 0.4 end distToAlignment = math.abs(ai.DistanceToAlignment) if (curveRadius ~= math.huge) then --Std Bane NOR approximation formulae: Ki = 81000.0/(2*curveRadius) Ky = 63000.0/(2*curveRadius) end if (ai.CurveRotation == "CCW") then tolerance = tolerance + (Ky/1000.0) else tolerance = tolerance + (Ki/1000.0) end if (distToAlignment <= tolerance) then return string.format("%.3f: ERROR - Signal too close to track '%s' w.r.t. tolerance %.3f.", distToAlignment,ai.AlignmentName,tolerance),_error elseif (distToAlignment > tolerance and distToAlignment <= (tolerance + 0.4)) then return string.format("%.3f: WARNING - Signal close to track '%s', less than 0.4 m from tolerance %.3f.", distToAlignment,ai.AlignmentName,tolerance),_warning else return string.format("%.3f: OK - Signal is far from track '%s' w.r.t. tolerance %.3f.", distToAlignment,ai.AlignmentName,tolerance),_ok end end

LuaFunction.Name: NOBN_sig_chkLeftSideDistanceFromSignalToTrack()

CustomAttribute.Name: AngularOffset
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'AngularOffset' custom property [DD] is added to the object's basic 3D orientation. The basic orientation is defined by the current 'dir' property's up/down/none/both/unknown value. If property dir is 'unknown' then the orientation will be 45 degrees as a visual reminder that dir is unknown. For some objects types (e.g. yokes) the 2D symbol orientation will also be affected.

CustomAttribute.Name: IsySted
CustomAttribute.Description: The IsySted [Enum] is a string from an from external file, referenced as a path+filename and parsed with suitable Lua code, declared in global property 'ExternalFileObjectReferences'.

CustomAttribute.Name: Sunscreen
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Sunscreen' custom property [- | Ja] decides whether the signal has background screen ('Ja') or not ('-').

CustomAttribute.Name: Markerboard
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR ERTMS Markerboard, signal E35 Stop marker. Yellow arrow with white outline on blue background.

CustomAttribute.Name: ErtmsDwarfSignal
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR ERTMS dwarf signal, signal 43/44/45/46. Four blue lanterns lit in pairs (43=horizontal, 44='slash', 45=vertical, 46='backslash').

CustomAttribute.Name: MainSignal
CustomAttribute.Description:
Bane NOR 1/2/3-lantern optical main signal.
20a=*Red:Stop(entry/block)
20b=Red:Stop(intermediate/exit)
21(3-light main)=UpperGreen:Proceed with caution
21(2-light main)=LowerGreen:Proceed with caution
21(repeater)=UpperGreen:Proceed with caution
22=UpperGreen+LowerGreen:Proceed.

CustomAttribute.Name: EndOfTrainRouteSignal
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR S66 black/yellow board:End of train route movement authority (with or without an ensuing main signal).

CustomAttribute.Name: DistantSignal
CustomAttribute.Description:
Bane NOR 2-lantern optical distant signal.
23=*Yellow:Stop ahead
24=*Yellow/*Green:Reduced speed ahead
25=*Green:Line speed ahead.

CustomAttribute.Name: DwarfSignal
CustomAttribute.Description:
Bane NOR optical shunting signal.
43=TwoHorizontalWhite:Shunting forbidden
44=TwoSlantedWhite:Cautious shunting
45=TwoVerticalWhite:Shunting allowed
46a=OneWhite:local release
46b=TwoBackslantedWhite:Local release.

CustomAttribute.Name: HighShuntingSignal
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR High Shunting optical signal.\n41=SlantedWhiteLine:Cautious shunting with local release\n42=HorizontalWhiteLine:Shunting forbidden.

CustomAttribute.Name: PositionLamp
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR Position Lamp optical signal.\n.4C=*White:Last axle still occupying turnout section. Off:Trigger section not yet entered, or last axle not occupying turnout section anymore.

CustomAttribute.Name: CautiousDrivingSignal
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR Cautious Driving optical signal.\n32=White luminescent cross:Proceed with extra caution in train route (main signal shows Hs21, distant signal is shut off (Fs00).

CustomAttribute.Name: LineSignal
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR Line optical signal.\n35B=White luminescent letter:The signal shows a distinct letter representing one of several destination lines.

CustomAttribute.Name: OpticalSpeedSignal
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR Deviating Speed optical signal.\n.68C=WhiteDigit(s):Allowed speed over deviating turnout or group of turnouts ahead.

CustomAttribute.Name: DepartureSignal
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR Departure signal.\nLuminous White letter 'A' on black background (permission to depart is granted)'.

CustomAttribute.Name: BrakeTestSignal
CustomAttribute.Description: Bane NOR Brake Test Signal.\n.Luminous letter 'T' (activate brake), 'L' (loosen brake) or dark (no action).

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_SafetyDistanceFromSignalToOcsMast
CustomAttribute.Description: Below 6 meter: Warning – Signal is too close to OCS mast, a potential HVAC hazard for maintenance personnel.\nAbove 6 meter: OK – No known HVAC danger to personnel.

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_LeftSideDistanceFromSignalToTrack
CustomAttribute.Description:
Dwarf signal:\Below 2.37m: Error – Signal too close to track.
From 2.37m to 2.77m: Warning – Within tolerance, potentially too close to track.
Above 2.77m: OK – Far enough from track.

Other signals:
Below 2.52m: Error - Signal too close to track.
From 2.52m to 2.92m: Warning - Within tolerance, potentially too close to track.
Above 2.92m: OK - Far enough from track.

The calculations take into account the nose/coach midpoint curvature extension.

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_RightSideDistanceFromSignalToTrack
CustomAttribute.Description:
Dwarf signal:\Below 2.37m: Error – Signal too close to track.
From 2.37m to 2.77m: Warning – Within tolerance, potentially too close to track.
Above 2.77m: OK – Far enough from track.

Other signals:
Below 2.52m: Error - Signal too close to track.
From 2.52m to 2.92m: Warning - Within tolerance, potentially too close to track.
Above 2.92m: OK - Far enough from track.

The calculations take into account the nose/coach midpoint curvature extension.

LuaFunction.Name: _SA_SIG_signal_model3DName()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns 3D Model Name for a Bane NOR NSI-63 type signal, based on CustomProperties such as Hovedsignal, Forsignal, Dvergsignal etc.
LuaFunction.Formula:
function _SA_SIG_signal_model3DName() --Ref. https://orv.banenor.no/orv/doku.php?id=tjn:Kapittel_8 fra "Bane NOR – Trafikkregler for jernbanenettet (TJN) – gyldig fra 16.6.2019. Endret 24.4.2019." --Ref LISP-code for NO-BN's 2D library, file "Signal combinations.lsp" ca line number 350 where the symbol's CAD block name is constructed. local t if (Markerboard ~= "-") then t = "NO-BN-3D-SA-SIG-ERTMS" if not Yokemounted then if (RightSided and (dir == 'up')) or (LeftSided and (dir == 'down')) then t = t.."-E35L" else t = t.."-E35R" end elseif Yokemounted then t = t.."-E35D" end if (ErtmsDwarfSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-DS" end return t end
t = "NO-BN-3D-SA-SIG-NSI63" if (MainSignal == "RepHs1") then t = t.."-HSREP1" --RepHs 1-lys (øvre grønn i 2-lysramme, blendet nedre lanterne) - uten kne, oppover-montering, f.eks. på vegg elseif (MainSignal == "RepHs2") then t = t.."-HSREP2" --RepHs 1-lys (to grønne i 2-lysramme) - uten kne, oppover-montering, f.eks. på vegg elseif (MainSignal == "Hs1") then t = t.."-HS1" --Stopplykt, Hs20=Stopp=nedre rød elseif (MainSignal == "Hs2") then t = t.."-HS2" --2-lys Hs, Hs20=Stopp=nedre rød / Hs21=Kjør med redusert hast.=øvre grønn elseif (MainSignal == "Hs3") then t = t.."-HS3" --3-lys Hs, Hs20=Stopp=nedre rød / Hs21=Kjør med redusert hast.=øvre grønn / Hs22=Kjør=Øvre+nedre grønn end if (DistantSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-FS" end if (EndOfTrainRouteSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-TVS" end --Togvei slutt signal 66, 'S' if (DwarfSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-DS" end if (HighShuntingSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-ZS" end --Høyt skiftesignal if (PositionLamp ~= "-") then t = t.."-MKS" end --Middelkontrollampe signal, hvit blinkende if (CautiousDrivingSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-FKS" end if (LineSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-LS" end --Linjesignal (het 'hovedlinjesignal' tidligere) if (OpticalSpeedSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-LHS" end --Lysende HastighetsSignal, lysende 10-ere for en eller flere aspekter if (DepartureSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-AVS" end --Avgangssignal if (BrakeTestSignal ~= "-") then t = t.."-BPS" end --Bremseprøvesignal if Sunscreen == "-" then t = t.."-UTEN-SKJERM" end if Yokemounted then t = t.."-ÅK" end if t:match("%-NSI63%-DS") and not t:match("ÅK") then t = t.."-2000" end --Add '-2000' pole total length to shunting signal if free-standing shunting signal return t end

function _SA_SIG_ertms_model3DName() local t = "NO-BN-3D-SA-SIG-ERTMS" if Variant:match("E35")then t = t.."-E35" else return "Bad ERTMS markerboard Variant ["..Variant.."], cannot determine 3D Model Name.",_error end if Variant:match("sidestilt") then t = ((RightSided and dir == "up") or (LeftSided and dir == "down")) and "-HSIDE" or "-VSIDE" elseif Variant:match("over sporet") then t = t.."-OVER" else return "Bad Variant ["..Variant.."], cannot determine 3D Model Name.",_error end if Variant:match("dverg") then t = t.."-DS" end if Variant:match("lav") then t = t.."-LAV" end return t end

LuaFunction.Name: _SA_SIG_Togsporsignal_Model3DName()
LuaFunction.Formula: function _SA_SIG_Togsporsignal_Model3DName() local t = "NO-BN-3D-SA-SIG-NSI63-TOGSPORSIGNAL-" if Variant == "Togsporsignal 1-begrep" then return t.."HODE" elseif Variant == "Togsporsignal 1-begrep, sidestilt" then t = t.."HODE-MED-ARM" if RightSided then return (dir == 'up') and t.."-HSIDE" or t.."-VSIDE" else return (dir == 'up') and t.."-VSIDE" or t.."-HSIDE" end elseif Variant == "Togsporsignal 2-begrep" then return t.."HODER-MED-ARMER" elseif Variant == "Togsporsignal 2-begrep, sidestilt" then return t.."HODER-MED-ARMER" else return "Bad Variant ["..Variant.."], cannot determine 3D Model Name.",_warning end end

LuaExpression.Name: Offset3D.Z
LuaExpression.Formula: local a = Attachment local d = (Variant:find("sidestilt") or Variant:find("2%-begrep")) and 0.15 or 0 --juster litt ned hvis signalet har arm(er) if a ~= nil then if a.Variant:find(" 1.6m") then return 0.690 - d elseif a.Variant:find(" 2m") then return 1.090 - d elseif a.Variant:find(" 3m") then return 2.090 - d elseif a.Variant:find(" 3.2m") then return 2.290 - d else return 1.090 - d end else return 1.090 - d --Standard Ø76 stolpe er 2m høy end

CustomAttribute.Name: AngularOffset
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'AngularOffset' custom property [DD] is added to the object's basic 3D orientation. The basic orientation is defined by the current 'dir' property's up/down/none/both/unknown value. If property dir is 'unknown' then the orientation will be 45 degrees as a visual reminder that dir is unknown. For some objects types (e.g. yokes) the 2D symbol orientation will also be affected.

CustomAttribute.Name: Yokemounted
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Yokemounted' boolean custom property defines whether the object (board, signal etc) has its own mast (default:false) or is suspended from a yoke (true).

CustomAttribute.Name: SpreadingLens
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SpreadingLens' custom property [Ja,-] defines whether the signal shall use spreading lenses (default: '-').

CustomAttribute.Name: Discipline
CustomAttribute.Description: The custom 'Discipline' attribute [Felles | Skilt | Overbygning | Underbygning | Kontaktledning | Signal | Tele | Lavspent] identifies the discpline owning the object.

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_NumberOfOcpAreas
CustomAttribute.Description: Most objects shall belong to one or more Operation / Control Point (OCP) areas, holding properties such as location name and/or resource names.

LuaExpression.Name: RelativeElevation
LuaExpression.Formula: if Yokemounted == nil then return 0 else return Yokemounted and 8.0 or 0 end

CustomAttribute.Name: IsySted
CustomAttribute.Description: The IsySted [Enum] is a string from an from external file, referenced as a path+filename and parsed with suitable Lua code, declared in global property 'ExternalFileObjectReferences'.

LuaFunction.Name: _SA_SIG_Planovergangssignal_Model3DName()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the 3D model name for a Level Crossing signal (towards track).
LuaFunction.Formula: function _SA_SIG_Planovergangssignal_Model3DName() local t = "NO-BN-3D-SA-SIG-NSI63-W-PLANOVERGANG" if Variant == "Planovergang, signal" then return t.."-SIGNAL" elseif Variant == "Planovergang, forsignal" then return t.."-FORSIGNAL" else return "Bad Variant ["..Variant.."], cannot determine 3D Model Name.",_warning end end

SymbolDefinition.BlockNameFormat: NO-BN-2D-JBTSI-SIGNAL {% if Variant == 'Planovergang, signal' %}20-HS2 {% elsif Variant == 'Planovergang, forsignal' %}20-HS2 {% else %}BAD_VARIANT {% endif %}

CustomAttribute.Name: AngularOffset
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'AngularOffset' custom property [DD] is added to the object's basic 3D orientation. The basic orientation is defined by the current 'dir' property's up/down/none/both/unknown value. If property dir is 'unknown' then the orientation will be 45 degrees as a visual reminder that dir is unknown. For some objects types (e.g. yokes) the 2D symbol orientation will also be affected.

CustomAttribute.Description: The lighting fixture's battery backup requirement [ Nei (none) | Ja, krav til oppetid (Yes, required) ].

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYA_LightFixtureRalColorCode
CustomAttribute.Description: The lighting fixture's RAL color code [ Ukjent (unknown) | <RAL code text string> ].

CustomAttribute.Name: AngularOffset
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'AngularOffset' custom property [DD] is added to the object's basic 3D orientation. The basic orientation is defined by the current 'dir' property's up/down/none/both/unknown value. If property dir is 'unknown' then the orientation will be 45 degrees as a visual reminder that dir is unknown. For some objects types (e.g. yokes) the 2D symbol orientation will also be affected.

CustomAttribute.Name: Tag
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Tag' custom property holds a unique identifier, within an administration's context, such as a unique key for the administration's asset management database. Hide/unhide using the ShowLayer tool.

CustomAttribute.Name: ObjectInfo
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'ObjectInfo' custom property holds user-defined information which needs to be shown in drawings. Hide/unhide using the ShowLayer tool. Extra information, e.g. for the building process, should be stored in the Description property.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierName
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierName' custom property holds the name of the supplier (or service, if the object is an abstract entity).

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierWebsite
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierWebsite' custom property holds the IRI of the supplier's website.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierEmail
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierEmail' custom property holds the supplier's E-mail address.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierSupportPhoneNumber
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierSupportPhoneNumber' custom property holds the phone number for the supplier's support service.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierWarrantyExpirationDate
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierWarrantyExpirationDate' custom property holds the expiration date for the object's warranty.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierModelName
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierModelName' custom property identifies the object by its supplier's inventory system model name.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierModelCode
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierModelCode' custom property identifies the object by its supplier's inventory system's model code.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierDrawingTitle
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierDrawingTitle' custom property holds a drawing title from the supplier's archive system.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierPartSerialNumber

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_NumberOfOcpAreas
CustomAttribute.Description: Most objects shall belong to one or more Operation / Control Point (OCP) areas, holding properties such as location name and/or resource names.

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYS_SubVariant
CustomAttribute.Description: The lighting fixture subvariant (the available selections depend on the main variant).

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYS_MastHeight
CustomAttribute.Description: The lighting fixture's mast height [mm]. Note: 3D model name will be deduced in steps of 250 mm from 0 to 1000, thereafter in steps of 500 mm.

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYS_Foundation
CustomAttribute.Description: 'Ja' if the light mast comes with an integrated steel foundation, otherwise '-' (default) if no foundation is required.

CustomAttribute.Name: Number
CustomAttribute.Description: The number of identical (or similar) lighting fixtures.

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYS_Producer
CustomAttribute.Description: The lighting fixture's producer [freetext], e.g. 'Ukjent' (unknown), 'Glamox', 'Sebra light'.

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYS_ProductType
CustomAttribute.Description: The lighting fixture's product type [freetext], e.g. 'Ukjent' (unknown), 'Glow 300'.

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYS_Power
CustomAttribute.Description: The lighting fixture's power [W] per specimen.

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYS_PowerSource
CustomAttribute.Description: The lighting fixture's power source [freetext], e.g. 'Ukjent' (unknown), 'Hovedtavle bygg E', 'El.teknisk hus H1'.

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYS_TotalPower
CustomAttribute.Description: The lighting fixture(s)' total power consumption [kW], for all concerned specimens collectively.

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYS_ControlType
CustomAttribute.Description: The lighting control system [ Ukjent (unknown) | Ingen (none) | Fotocelle | TIOS | Tidsstyrt | Togleder/TXP/El-kraft sentral | Øvrige ].

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYS_BatteryBackup
CustomAttribute.Description: The lighting fixture's battery backup requirement [ Nei (none) | Ja, krav til oppetid (Yes, required) ].

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYS_DrawingNumber
CustomAttribute.Description: The distribution panel's layout drawing's archive number [freetext], e.g. 'EL.108788-000', 'IUP-00-N-00648'.

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_LYS_LightTechnique
CustomAttribute.Description: The lighting fixture's battery backup requirement [ Nei (none) | Ja, krav til oppetid (Yes, required) ].

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_FSP_OverloadProtection
CustomAttribute.Description: The overload protection's fuse [A].

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_FSP_DistributionTarget

CustomAttribute.Description: The ID of the distribution panel's energy meter [freetext], e.g. '65801608'.

CustomAttribute.Description: The distribution panel's distribution system type [ Ukjent | IT | IT fra KL-anlegget | KL | TN-C | TN-C-S | TN-S | TT ].

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_FSP_DistributionVoltage
CustomAttribute.Description: The distribution panel's voltage [ Ukjent | 1000 | 230 | 400 | 690 | KL | Lavere enn 230 ].

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_FSP_DistributionPhases
CustomAttribute.Description: The distribution panel's phases [ Ukjent | 1 | 2 | 3 | 3 + N ].

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_FSP_MainFuseType
CustomAttribute.Description: The distribution panel's main fuse type [freetext], e.g. 'Automatsikring', 'K&M, IZM, 10-400N', 'LH-00'.

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_FSP_DistributionId
CustomAttribute.Description: The distribution panel's own identity [freetext], e.g. 'A6-TA2, Skamarken', 'Fordeling B1'.

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_FSP_DrawingNumber
CustomAttribute.Description: The distribution panel's layout drawing's archive number [freetext], e.g. 'EL.108788-000', 'IUP-00-N-00648'.

CustomAttribute.Name: EL_FSP_IpAddress
CustomAttribute.Description: The distribution panel's IP adresse identity [freetext], e.g. '192.86.123.03', 'Ukjent' (unknown), 'Ingen' (none).

CustomAttribute.Name: AngularOffset
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'AngularOffset' custom property [DD] is added to the object's basic 3D orientation. The basic orientation is defined by the current 'dir' property's up/down/none/both/unknown value. If property dir is 'unknown' then the orientation will be 45 degrees as a visual reminder that dir is unknown. For some objects types (e.g. yokes) the 2D symbol orientation will also be affected.

CustomAttribute.Name: Tag
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'Tag' custom property holds a unique identifier, within an administration's context, such as a unique key for the administration's asset management database. Hide/unhide using the ShowLayer tool.

CustomAttribute.Name: ObjectInfo
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'ObjectInfo' custom property holds user-defined information which needs to be shown in drawings. Hide/unhide using the ShowLayer tool. Extra information, e.g. for the building process, should be stored in the Description property.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierName
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierName' custom property holds the name of the supplier (or service, if the object is an abstract entity).

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierWebsite
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierWebsite' custom property holds the IRI of the supplier's website.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierEmail
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierEmail' custom property holds the supplier's E-mail address.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierSupportPhoneNumber
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierSupportPhoneNumber' custom property holds the phone number for the supplier's support service.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierWarrantyExpirationDate
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierWarrantyExpirationDate' custom property holds the expiration date for the object's warranty.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierModelName
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierModelName' custom property identifies the object by its supplier's inventory system model name.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierModelCode
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierModelCode' custom property identifies the object by its supplier's inventory system's model code.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierPartName
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierPartName' custom property identifies the object by its supplier's inventory system's part name.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierPartCode
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierPartCode' custom property identifies the object by its supplier's inventory system's part code.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierDrawingArchive
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierDrawingArchive' custom property holds a reference to the supplier's archive identification.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierDrawingNumber
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierDrawingNumber' custom property holds a drawing id number from the supplier's archive system.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierDrawingTitle
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierDrawingTitle' custom property holds a drawing title from the supplier's archive system.

CustomAttribute.Name: SupplierPartSerialNumber
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'SupplierPartSerialNumber' custom property identifies the object uniquely by its supplier's inventory part serial number.

CustomAttribute.Name: ProjectName
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'ProjectName' custom property holds the name of the project where the object was conceived, modified or consolidated.

CustomAttribute.Name: ProjectConsultant
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'ProjectConsultant' custom property holds a reference to the project's consultant which conceived, modified or consolidated the object.

CustomAttribute.Name: ProjectAssignmentId
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'ProjectAssignmentId' custom property holds a reference to the project's consultant's assignment Id.

CustomAttribute.Name: ProjectDrawingArchive
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'ProjectDrawingArchive' custom property holds a reference to the project's archive identification.

CustomAttribute.Name: ProjectDrawingNumber
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'ProjectDrawingNumber' custom property holds a drawing id number from the project's archive system.

CustomAttribute.Name: ProjectDrawingTitle
CustomAttribute.Description: The 'ProjectDrawingTitle' custom property holds a drawing title from the project's archive system.
